title: [Client] Typo Error on Cassiopeia's Twin Fang Ability Description
body: If you check Cassiopeia's Twin Fang ability description in the client, it shows '..increasing further Poison damage delt..'. Simple Typo error which probably means '..Poison damage dealt..' this was reported by IIVIIVIIVIIVII.

replies.body: Good eye!  This does fall on the lower end of the prioritization spectrum (especially since these types of fixes are more complex than you might think; mostly because anything text related goes through certain localization steps), but I can still make sure the correct people know about it
Thanks Afic. I'll be sure to take note and we appreciate that you included some context.
